content.rendered:
The Mnambithi College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Mnambithi College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Mnambithi College based on the information provided within it.

Mnambithi College Student Portal

Note: Mnambithi College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Mnambithi College Prospectus 2024

The Mnambithi College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.feta.gov.za/.

Mnambithi College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

see also Thekwini College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
